subdisciplines.name: Nuclear Astrophysics
subdisciplines.description: The study of nuclear reactions in stars and other celestial bodies.

subdisciplines.name: Radiochemistry
subdisciplines.description: The study of radioactive materials, their properties, behavior and uses.

subdisciplines.name: Nuclear Medicine
subdisciplines.description: The use of radioactive materials for medical diagnosis, treatment, and research.

subdisciplines.name: Nuclear Physics
subdisciplines.description: The study of atomic nuclei and their interactions.
